attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-1088

Date: 2016-12-02

Whereas the Battleford Chamber of Commerce, in Saskatchewan, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on April 13, 1909, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves the Battleford Chamber of Commerce.


 

Attendu que la Battleford Chamber of Commerce (Saskatchewan), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 13 avril 1909, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil dissout la Battleford Chamber of Commerce.
